scripts.postbuild: sh -c 'if [ -d dist/task-rating-frontend ]; then mkdir -p dist/task-rating-frontend/browser || true; if [ -f dist/task-rating-frontend/index.html ]; then (cd dist/task-rating-frontend && find . -maxdepth 1 -mindepth 1 ! -name browser -print0 | xargs -0 -I{} cp -R {} browser/ || true); fi; if [ ! -f dist/task-rating-frontend/browser/index.html ]; then f=$(find dist/task-rating-frontend -type f -name index.html -print -quit) && [ -n "$f" ] && cp "$f" dist/task-rating-frontend/browser/index.html || true; fi; fi'
